title: ‘He’s Not Old. I Know He Is Hungry:’ Jayco AlUla Keeps Faith in Caleb Ewan’s Giro d’Italia Prospects
content:
Head DS Matt White backs Aussie while acknowledging rivals: ‘This is the most competitive sprints field I’ve ever seen.’

Read the full article at ‘He’s Not Old. I Know He Is Hungry:’ Jayco AlUla Keeps Faith in Caleb Ewan’s Giro d’Italia Prospects on Velo.
author: sstokes
